Package nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.util.implementations

Class LocationSpigot

java.lang.Object
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.util.implementations.LocationSpigot
All Implemented Interfaces:
ILocation
public final class LocationSpigot extends Object implements ILocation
Represents an implementation of ILocation for the Spigot platform.
Author:
Pim
